channel.title: [[317 Bandos IsleV1+Source 317]]
channel.description:
Bandos Isle [img]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy171/MasterSinX9/BandosIsleSigNature-1.jpg[/img] I would like to personally thank "Dapk1nmasta ;)" on my server for helping me out.
Credits to reapagescape for there base! Also the black dragons hit like ...78 more like 81 so if you want to code them in as a hard boss to defeat, You can because its harder then anything else i believe!also i took my time into this source/server didnt rush anything
Also, Fully working compiler for the people with the latest version of java downloaded!!! What i've added -
Eating without a weapon, New home, New train, New veng, (really funny if you have a sense of humor) Added godwars!, Added ::bandosmini! (for getting bandos warspear, bandos scimitar, and bandos whip!) Added new pkbox, Added new jad area, Added new skill area!, Added 2 new quests, Removed god items and weapons from shop (but ::gsmini and kbd give godswords still... shifty) Made all hard monsters talk! EX: I'm a noob. But i still own you! (kalphite queen) Made all skills working! Made crystal mod weapon by - Adding more range bonus and making it should 4 times a second on monsters only! Made enchanted mod armour by - Adding 200 bonus to everything for top and bottom! And alot more! Big Grin winksmile Big Grin winksmile Big Grin winksmile Big Grin winksmile
Godwars- Has Saradomin Boss, Armadyl Boss, and Bandos Boss. They all fight back and drop correct items! ( drop rate middle) :eek: Here Are Some Pics Train :D [img]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy171/MasterSinX9/evolved0006.png[/img] Home :) [img]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy171/MasterSinX9/evolved0005.png[/img] Shops ;) [img]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy171/MasterSinX9/evolved0007.png[/img] Pk Box ;D [img]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy171/MasterSinX9/evolved0008.png[/img] Quick SneakPeak On Veng :cool: [img]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy171/MasterSinX9/evolved0009.png[/img]
Server also has - Train2 Drags1 Drags2 Edgeville Hangout Castle wars Kalphite queen Drop party area Slayer Huge command base And More!!!
"The secret tree" - In edgeville "::edge" walk to the east of the bank by the river, and you'll see a willow tree. Click on the Willow Tree and it will give you full Bandos Armour and Bandos Godsword. ::bandosmini ^thats one of the commands that lets you get spears and awesome weapons. Source: http://uppit.com/v/xnc93r6m
Client will be coming out soon with the V2 also. if you want you can gimme me rep but thats your decision not mine :D >Id's. DragonClaws Id(type this ::pickup) 08002 DragonPlatebody Id (Type this ::pickup) 16600 ^those id's work for some clients most clients have them as null but my client doesnt

item.title: [[317 Bandos IsleV1+Source 317]]
item.dc:creator: @sharecode sharecode
item.description:
@sharecode wrote:

Bandos Isle

BandosIsleSigNature-1.jpg824×572

I would like to personally thank “Dapk1nmasta ;)” on my server for helping me out.

Credits to reapagescape for there base!
Also the black dragons hit like …78 more like 81 so if you want to code them in as a hard boss to defeat, You can
because its harder then anything else i believe!also i took my time into this source/server didnt rush anything

Also, Fully working compiler for the people with the latest version of java downloaded!!!
What i’ve added -

Eating without a weapon,
New home,
New train,
New veng, (really funny if you have a sense of humor)
Added godwars!,
Added ::bandosmini! (for getting bandos warspear, bandos scimitar, and bandos whip!)
Added new pkbox,
Added new jad area,
Added new skill area!,
Added 2 new quests,
Removed god items and weapons from shop (but ::gsmini and kbd give godswords still… shifty)
Made all hard monsters talk! EX: I’m a noob. But i still own you! (kalphite queen)
Made all skills working!
Made crystal mod weapon by - Adding more range bonus and making it should 4 times a second on monsters only!
Made enchanted mod armour by - Adding 200 bonus to everything for top and bottom!
And alot more! Big Grin winksmile Big Grin winksmile Big Grin winksmile Big Grin winksmile

Godwars- Has Saradomin Boss, Armadyl Boss, and Bandos Boss. They all fight back and drop correct items! ( drop rate middle) :eek:
Here Are Some Pics

Server also has -

Edgeville
Hangout
Castle wars
Kalphite queen
Drop party area
Slayer
Huge command base
And More!!!

“The secret tree” - In edgeville “::edge” walk to the east of the bank by the river, and you’ll see a willow tree. Click on the
Willow Tree and it will give you full Bandos Armour and Bandos Godsword.
::bandosmini
^thats one of the commands that lets you get spears and awesome weapons.
Source: http://uppit.com/v/xnc93r6m

Client will be coming out soon with the V2 also.
if you want you can gimme me rep but thats your decision not mine

Id’s.
DragonClaws Id(type this ::pickup) 08002
DragonPlatebody Id (Type this ::pickup) 16600
^those id’s work for some clients most clients have them as null but my client doesnt
